Function.Description: The bitwiseOr function performs a numerical bitwise or of each expression from left to right, returning the value of the result as an Integer.

Brief.Overview: The bitwiseOr function performs a numerical bitwise or of each expression {exp} from left to right, returning the value of the result as an Integer. The arguments are assumed to be Integers, and are not checked for the correct type. Characters and Boolean arguments will be treated as Integers in this function.
Brief.Usage: Use the bitwiseOr function when a binary integer operation is required.

Argument.Name: exp ...
Argument.Note: One or more Integer expressions. A Character or Boolean expression is converted to Integer.
